note.p: AssocMaterial: CSAC 8/2/74. Papers deposited in the Bodleian Library, Oxford
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1957 vol 3 pp 257-272, plate, by A von Engel
References: B Bleaney, FRS, 'Two Oxford science Professors, F Soddy and JSE Townsend' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 83-88, plate
Brebis Bleaney, 'A Century of Physics in Oxford' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 333-343
Brebis Bleaney, 'The Physical Sciences in Oxford, 1918-1939 and Earlier' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 247-261
